short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loading next 2,3,4,5 pages automatically within first Bing search page, saving a little clicking time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search-more extension will load next 2,3,4,5 pages automatically when FIRST Bing search page is loaded. The search results of page 1,2,3,4,5 will be rendered within the save window, saving you a little clicking time.
Only for https://cn.bing.com at current version.
